description: MCP server for GROMACS 2025.4 providing molecular dynamics simulation, analysis, and workflow management tools with both local scripts and MCP tools supporting synchronous operations for quick analysis and asynchronous job submission for long-running simulations

tools.name: analyze_tpr
tools.description: Analyze TPR files and extract simulation parameters
tools.example_prompt: Use analyze_tpr to examine @examples/data/sample.tpr and save results to results/analysis.txt

tools.name: run_gromacs_command
tools.description: Execute GROMACS command-line tools with flexible parameter handling
tools.example_prompt: Run the GROMACS dump command on @examples/data/sample.tpr to see the file structure

tools.name: run_gromacs_workflow
tools.description: Create and manage GROMACS simulation workflows
tools.example_prompt: Run the demo workflow with verbose output to see how workflow management works

tools.name: submit_md_simulation
tools.description: Submit molecular dynamics simulation for background processing
tools.example_prompt: Submit an MD simulation for @examples/data/sample.tpr with 50000 steps, name it 'long_test'

tools.name: submit_batch_analysis
tools.description: Submit batch analysis for multiple input files
tools.example_prompt: Submit batch analysis for these TPR files: @examples/data/sample.tpr

tools.name: get_job_status
tools.example_prompt: Check the status of job long_test

tools.name: get_job_result
tools.example_prompt: Get the results for the latest job

tools.name: get_job_log
tools.description: View execution logs with tail support
tools.example_prompt: Get the log output for the latest job

tools.name: list_jobs
tools.description: List all jobs with optional status filter

tools.name: get_server_info
tools.example_prompt: What are the capabilities of this GROMACS MCP server?

tools.name: list_available_commands
tools.description: List all supported commands and workflows
tools.example_prompt: What tools are available from gromacs-2025.4?

scripts.name: md_simulation.py
scripts.description: Run MD simulations using GROMACS mdrun

scripts.name: tpr_analysis.py
scripts.description: Analyze TPR files using gmx dump

demo_data.description: Compiled simulation file (1000 Argon atoms, 500k steps)
MD parameters (500k steps, 87K temperature, md-vv integrator)
Topology file (1000 Argon atoms, Lennard-Jones parameters)
Test data definitions for gmxapi development
